title: foxyshiba
author: foxyshiba
content: | Foxy SHIBA | Launch 1st March Community-Driven Project Expert Dev&Team | RevolutionaryAbout Foxy ShibaRevolutionary Community Driven by Foxy Shiba.designed to offer the holder a host of benefits Undoubtedly unusual from all the rest, A team of experts who develop the promotion of the coins and will aim for high goals in the crypto field for the highest success with a lot of motivation .Website: https://foxyshiba.netTelegram: https://t.me/foxyshibTwitter: https://twitter.com/FoxyShibFoxy Shiba - Next Level !Hey, would you like to attend a space journey with your favorite crypto? The Foxy Shiba Token team will develop special games for Holders and Crypto Enthusiasts who want to make money by playing. Get crypto and NFT rewards by playing crypto games!0% Buy Fee13% Sell Fee10% Fee is automatically added to LP3% Marketing FeeReady for Launch 1st march!Marketing Push!CMC & Cgecko also will be published on over 100+ recognized crypto sites.RoadmapBSC Contract CreationStealth Launch at Binance Smart Chain.Website Launch V1Foxy Shiba Token Website Creation & Branding.ADS and TG marketingYahoo Finance, Benzinga & Tech Bullion article submissionInfluencer promosTwitter Influencer promos Coinsniper, stocktwits, Coinhunters & Coinvote AdsCommunity Build upBecause of Shiba's army, we need to be united, strengthen the community, conquer every possible social square so that everyone will know usInformation about token updates.FoxyShiba Smart Contract logo update with socials on bscListing Coin Geckocoin gecko is a large site with a variety of cryptocurrencies, advertising there will lead to high exposure.Foxy Shiba MarketplaceIn the future we want to open a Marketplace of Foxy Shiba products, some of which will go to donation and marketing.Play to Earn GameWe want to promote the field of P2E so that the users who like games can earn with us!Road to the MetaverseThe plan create a partnership / development in this field.Coinmarketcap ListingLeading cryptocurrency site to advertise Foxy Shiba there will lead to high exposure that will strengthen our community.Planning for FoxyShiba Metaverse Learning PlatformVR and AR based metaverse learning platform project planning.non-fungible token (NFT)Foxy Shiba Team will publish NFT Boxes and Characters.Much more suprises!Coming Soon...

comments.author: bakasabo
comments.created_time: January 25, 2023, 10:28:39 AMLast edit: January 25, 2023, 12:04:16 PM by bakasabo
comments.body: What exactly revolutionary you can offer, if you want to hype on Shiba Inu name? You plan to create a plate-2-earn game, metaverse, NFT collection and a marketplace? And you dont even have a whitepaper or at least a litepaper. How do you plan to achieve all that? Also I have noticed a video trailer of your project. You have used https://www.renderforest.com/template/Sci-fi-space-cosmic-video?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=Sci-fi-space-cosmic-video&utm_campaign=yt template to create it. Why dont you leave any reference to it? Frankly, your project look weak, webpage is simple and you did not put much effort to create all that. It will be extremely hard for you to achieve something on crypto market.

It will be extremely hard for you to achieve something on crypto market. https://foxyshiba.gitbook.io/foxy-shiba/dyor.So what are you trying to say with that post? That is not a proper whitepaper. You want to offer so many features in your project, but have project description in only few paragraphs. You have a tick mark next to "Whitepaper Publish". 102 words paragraph, is this your whitepaper? I am only trying to help, but you drown yourself. Your roadmap shows that you had an airdrop. This must be a mysterious one. Cant find any signs of it. Good luck.
